AddMeal.firstEntry: Put on your first meal. Make sure that your meals are not too varied at the beginning, so that you can learn from your values. Also, try not to consume additional carbohydrates for three hours after eating, so that you can see if you have correctly estimated.

firstOpenDialog.title: Everything in one place
firstOpenDialog.description: There are already many apps that you can use to track your activities. We have integrated some of them so that you have all the information in one place. This helps you better understand the impact of your meals. To see this data in meala, you need to connect the apps in the settings.
firstOpenDialog.subtitle: Currently you can link the following data:

home.title: Find saved meals
home.description: After you enter your first meal, it will appear here. By intelligently labeling your meals, you can find them again later and compare them with similar meals.

places.title: Places and restaurants
places.description: You have a favorite restaurant? You'll find it here. The more you eat the same meals, the better you will understand them.

date.title: A very special day
date.description: You are looking for an exact day? Then you are right here. Tip: If you use FatSecret connect your account and your entries from the other app will be displayed here.

Entries.calculating: Time between eating and injection is calculated

GI.IntroText: The glycemic index (GI) from 0 to 100 Example: Dextrose has a GI of 100
GI.glyx_description: When blood sugar rises quickly, it can have many causes. For example, an unsuitable time between injection and eating, stress or even sport, when adrenaline is released. With the consumption of meals there is already a unit of measurement that describes how quickly the carbohydrates act in a certain period of time.It's called Glycemic Index or in short Glyx. The higher the value is, the more sugar enters the blood after carbohydrate consumption. The value can also help to choose the right hypo snack. Because in the event of hypoglycemia, a glycemic index is helpful return to target range quickly.

Settings.Info: Your Link to Nightscout should look like
Settings.feedback: You have found a suggestion for improvement or a problem? Feel free to send us your feedback to mail@heymeala.com
Settings.token: If your site has a token or a password - enter it here
Settings.uploadTreatmentsInfo: To enable treatment upload you need to enter a user-token that grants access to the careportal. If you don't have a user in your Nightscout Settings, go to your Nightscout-Website navigate to Admin-Tools and add a new user that has careportal write access. You'll get a token that you can enter above. After that you can enable treatment upload. ATTENTION: If you delete a meal entry we don't delete the Nightscout entry. Please delete or edit it yourself for now.
Settings.nightscoutRecommendation: We recommend using Nightscout if you have access to Insulin and Carb data. If you just need Bloodglucose Data you can switch to Apple Health Kit too.
Settings.wrongUrl: Url is wrong or your Nightscout-Site is offline

Libre.text: At the moment the only way to get Libre Data is via Nightscout. We are currently working on an integration with Tidepool

About.title: Why meala
About.p1: The estimation of carbohydrates is the most influential source of error in diabetes therapy - This resulted in a survey with over 100 participants and is the reason for this app. Learning from your own mistakes and drawing on the experience of other users - this is what the App meala allows restaurant visitors. Depending on the location, others already use recorded meals with their nutritional values or recorded by the user himself via image recognition. Three hours after the meal, the app analyzes the carbohydrate and spray-eating distance estimates and indicates whether the target range has been reached.
About.p2: meala must not be used to make medical decisions. It is a research tool only and is provided as is without warranty of any kind, either expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. The entire risk as to the quality and performance of the program is with you. Schuld the program prove defective, you assume the cost of all necessary servicing, repair or correction.
